prompt: Playful, cute vector illustration with rounded shapes and soft shadows, pastel palette (mint, coral, sky blue, sunny yellow) on off-white background. Big central illustration, minimal text. rubric: Wait vs travel tradeoff is implied.

improvements: Clarify the difference in route lengths more explicitly, for example by slightly extending the upper (travel) path or shortening the lower (wait) path so the contrast is visually obvious at a glance.

grade.summary: All rubric items are satisfied: two distinct routing choices are clearly visible, the wait vs travel tradeoff is implied with a queued path vs a timed world-route, the title 'Routing' appears in the top-left, and the overall style is playful, cute, and minimal with pastel colors and rounded shapes.
